comment: Definitely sorry to hear you had a bad reaction to the second dose. That totally sucks So far, I am experiencing no symptoms or side effects. Not even a sore arm. I feel a bit of relief, but other than that I am swimmingly good. I'm just glad that there is finally hope for me.
amr:

comment: House Pfizer! I didn't have a pleasant reaction to the nd dose, but momentary suffering was a small price to pay for knowing I'm protected and I'm protecting others.
amr:

                  :op1 "Pfizer")
